mapper.select: SELECT REGION_CODE AS regionCode, REGION_NAME AS regionName FROM REGION;

SELECT D.DISTRICT_CODE AS districtCode, R.REGION_CODE AS regionCode, R.REGION_NAME AS regionName, D.DISTRICT_NAME AS districtName FROM DISTRICT AS D INNER JOIN REGION AS R ON D.REGION_CODE = R.REGION_CODE;
SELECT DISTRICT_CODE, REGION_CODE, DISTRICT_NAME FROM DISTRICT WHERE REGION_CODE = #{regionCode};

SELECT R.REGION_CODE AS regionCode, D.DISTRICT_CODE AS districtCode, P.DISTRICT_DEP_CODE AS districtDepCode, R.REGION_NAME AS regionName, D.DISTRICT_NAME AS districtName, P.DISTRICT_DEP_NAME AS districtDepName FROM DISTRICT AS D INNER JOIN REGION AS R ON D.REGION_CODE = R.REGION_CODE INNER JOIN DISTRICT_DEP AS P ON D.DISTRICT_CODE = P.DISTRICT_CODE;

SELECT RG.REGION_CODE AS regionCode, RG.REGION_NAME AS regionName, DD.DISTRICT_DEP_CODE AS districtDepCode, DD.DISTRICT_DEP_NAME AS districtDepName FROM REGION AS RG INNER JOIN DISTRICT_DEP AS DD ON RG.REGION_CODE = DD.REGION_CODE WHERE DD.REGION_CODE = #{regionCode}
